1370: Stemaers was born in Die Camp in 1370.
Got married to Reynwi at age 20 in 1370.
Had a son with Reynwi, Harderico, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Reynwi, Hugheman, at age 21.
1374: Had a son with Reynwi, Rembrandus, at age 24.
1381: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Marisseis, at age 31.
1383: Had a daughter with Reynwi, Imma, at age 33.
1385: Had a son with Reynwi, Engelbertus, at age 35.
1386: Had a son with Reynwi, Jacobus, at age 36.
1389: Had a son with Reynwi, Eustacius, at age 39.
1391: Had a son with Reynwi, Weitijn, at age 41.
